name: frameFormatter
frameFormatter
Frame Format
info:
SOF(#),Date (DD/MM/YYYY),Time(HH:MM:SS),Product ID,Device Label, GSM Range, Slave ID, Flow Rate , Net Total Flow (Totalizer) ,EOF ($)

sample frame
#,20/03/2025,03:43:00,ABCD,Demo,60,1,80,150,$

API ROUTES
info:
1. POST  http://192.168.13.171:1880/api/data
BODY
{
  "productId":"BTP0524003",
  "date":"2024-10-14",
  "limit":10,
  "page":1
}
2. GET  http://192.168.13.171:1880/api/data?productId="BTP0524002"   
 get days of day available to show
3. GET http://192.168.13.171:1880/api/devices
get device list with latest data frame

4. POST /api/devices 
Register new device into system
Body
 {productId,
    slaveId,
    installDate,
    type,
    measurementUnit,
    pipeSize,
    powerType,
 }

5. GET /api/period?productId=""
